column4: I have heard of Open Bravo, how does it stack to MSFT CRM Great Plains, and other major players?
well I have a few clients that use openbravo successfully...however it will NOT run with icedtea  it must have sun java
i have run into that with online stock/option brokerage accounts
i had to raise hell just to have compatibility with Oracle Java running through Ubuntu
understood... I have the openbravo free package here somewhere...if not to large I can add to dropbox  hold on
download now so I can delete it   ...let me know when it is finished downloading
what mfg/model of system are you using?
intel  asus board  but only lucid and maverick exhibit this behavior
custom built not pre-built from mfg?
wondering if it has anything to do with touchscren implimentation
i would not what? report rhuthmbox bigs at launchpad?/
understood...however I read that he wanted to know the "place" to report bugs   but I agree about the possibility it may not be a bug
/ mamece2: it may be a support question, then one would want to perform a "question" against the package versus a bug.
